SITReg
======

Overview
--------
SITReg is a multi-resolution architecture for symmetric, inverse-consistent, and
topology-preserving registration.

Key modules
-----------
- ``MIR.models.SITReg``

Related tutorials
-----------------
- `IXI SITReg <https://github.com/junyuchen245/MIR/tree/main/tutorials/IXI_SITReg>`_
- `LUMIR25 SITReg <https://github.com/junyuchen245/MIR/tree/main/tutorials/lumir25_SITReg>`_
